Question
========

Many psychological research studies use convenience samples' of psychology students. For which of the following models of external validity is this particularly a problem?

Answerlist
----------

* Theoretical model of external validity.
* Generalization model of external validity.
* Representativeness model of external validity.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Theoretical model of external validity...: Incorrect
* Generalization model of external validity...: Correct
* Representativeness model of external validity...: Incorrect
